CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK(Id, CASE(Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c, "Not Submitted","Not Submitted", "Notified","Notified", "Submitted","Submitted", "Assigned","Assigned", "Reassigned","Reassigned", "Approved","Approved", "Rejected","Rejected", "Cancelled","Cancelled", "On Hold","On Hold", "None"), "_top" )
CustomField.label: Status
